statements: SELECT * FROM traditional_media_ratings WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT id, company_name, rating FROM traditional_media_ratings WHERE rating > 3.5
SELECT company_name, media_type FROM traditional_media_ratings WHERE media_type LIKE '%magazine%'
SELECT * FROM traditional_media_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT DISTINCT media_type FROM traditional_media_ratings
SELECT company_name, media_type, rating FROM traditional_media_ratings WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC, company_name ASC
SELECT * FROM traditional_media_ratings WHERE company_name LIKE 'ABC%' AND media_type = 'TV'
SELECT company_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM traditional_media_ratings GROUP BY company_name HAVING avg_rating > 3.0
SELECT company_name, media_type, rating FROM traditional_media_ratings ORDER BY company_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*), media_type FROM traditional_media_ratings GROUP BY media_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM traditional_media_ratings WHERE rating > 3.5;
SELECT media_company_name, media_type, rating FROM traditional_media_ratings WHERE media_type = 'TV Show';
SELECT media_company_name, rating_date FROM traditional_media_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_result FROM rating_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT analysis_date, media_company_name FROM rating_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM traditional_media_ratings WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC, rating_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT media_company_name, rating, rating_date FROM traditional_media_ratings WHERE media_type = 'TV Series' ORDER BY rating_date DESC, media_company_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT media_type, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM traditional_media_ratings GROUP BY media_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM rating_analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'Sentiment Analysis' AND analysis_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT media_company_name, COUNT(analysis_id) AS num_analyses FROM rating_analysis GROUP BY media_company_name HAVING num_analyses > 1 ORDER BY num_analyses DESC;
SELECT * FROM traditional_media_company;
SELECT company_name, company_type FROM traditional_media_company ORDER BY company_id DESC;
SELECT company_name, company_type, company_id FROM traditional_media_company WHERE company_type='Broadcast';
SELECT company_name, company_type FROM traditional_media_company WHERE company_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM ratings_data JOIN traditional_media_company ON ratings_data.company_id = traditional_media_company.company_id;
SELECT * FROM traditional_media_company;
SELECT company_name, company_type FROM traditional_media_company ORDER BY company_name ASC, company_type DESC;
SELECT c.company_name, r.date, r.rating FROM traditional_media_company c JOIN ratings_data r ON c.company_id = r.company_id WHERE r.rating > 4;

SELECT c.company_name, a.analysis_date, a.analysis_result FROM traditional_media_company c JOIN media_analysis a ON c.company_id = a.company_id WHERE a.analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';

SELECT c.company_name, COUNT(a.analysis_id) AS num_of_analysis FROM traditional_media_company c LEFT JOIN media_analysis a ON c.company_id = a.company_id GROUP BY c.company_name HAVING num_of_analysis > 2;
SELECT * FROM Media_Companies;
SELECT id, name FROM Ratings WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT name, department FROM Analysts WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM Shows ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT id, name, genre FROM Shows WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT * FROM Media_Companies WHERE country='USA';
SELECT name, country FROM Media_Companies ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT AVG(rating) FROM Ratings WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, genre, duration FROM Shows WHERE genre='Comedy' AND duration > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT Analysts.name, Analysts.department, Ratings.rating FROM Analysts INNER JOIN Ratings ON Analysts.id = Ratings.company_id ORDER BY Ratings.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_companies;
SELECT company_name, founding_year FROM media_companies ORDER BY founding_year DESC;
SELECT genre, year_aired FROM shows WHERE year_aired > 2000;
SELECT viewer_name, age, gender FROM viewers WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM ratings_data WHERE rating_value >= 4.0;
SELECT * FROM media_companies;
SELECT company_name, founding_year FROM media_companies ORDER BY founding_year DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM media_companies WHERE industry = 'Entertainment';
SELECT m.company_name, r.rating_value, s.show_name FROM media_companies m JOIN ratings_data r ON m.company_id = r.company_id JOIN shows s ON m.company_id = s.company_id;
SELECT v.viewer_name, v.gender, vr.rating_value FROM viewers v JOIN viewer_ratings vr ON v.viewer_id = vr.viewer_id ORDER BY vr.rating_value DESC;
